fields_of_interest: Business and Industry, Public Health, Food Safety
organisation_name: Federation of EU manufacturers and suppliers of ingredients to the Bakery, Patisserie and Confectionery Industries (Fedima)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
Fedima is the European federation of manufactuers and suppliers of ingredients to the bakery, confectionery and patisserie industries. Our members are likewise national associations across 13 EU Member States. 
 
We help our members to have access to a EU single market in order to facilitate their business activities within the European Union. Whenever requested Fedima also provides expertise to the EU institutions on items related to the bakery ingredients.
